context: Tests whether the agent demonstrates advanced Cucumber CLI usage, multiple format outputs, failure analysis workflows, and enterprise CI/CD integration patterns for BDD test execution.

checklist.name: Multiple output formats
checklist.description: Uses multiple --format options (JSON, HTML, JUnit) for different reporting needs

checklist.name: Advanced tag strategies
checklist.description: Demonstrates complex tag filtering for different pipeline stages (smoke vs regression vs integration)

checklist.name: CI/CD pipeline integration
checklist.description: Shows how BDD tests integrate into different CI/CD pipeline stages with appropriate execution strategies

checklist.name: Failure analysis workflow
checklist.description: Provides systematic approach for analyzing scenario failures and debugging steps

checklist.name: Performance and timing considerations
checklist.description: Addresses execution time requirements and optimization for different pipeline stages

checklist.name: Report organization and usage
checklist.description: Organizes different report formats for appropriate audiences (technical vs stakeholder)

checklist.name: Configuration management
checklist.description: Shows how to manage Cucumber configuration for different environments and use cases

checklist.name: Exit code handling
checklist.description: Properly handles Cucumber exit codes for CI/CD pipeline decision making
